mapper.insert: insert into member( member_no, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_tel, member_email, member_image, member_info ) values( member_seq.nextval, #{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_tel}, #{member_email}, #{image_path}, #{member_info})
mapper.update: update member set member_name = #{member_name}, member_pw = #{member_pw}, member_tel = #{member_tel}, member_email = #{member_email}, member_info = #{member_info} where member_id = #{member_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
